participant_1.background: i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i grew up in manhattan. i plan to go to business school next year. i drive a bmw.

participant_2.background: i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i play with my friends on the playground. i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i am in the third grade.

content.text: Hey! Do you drive a BMW?
